Title: OSPF adjacency flap under high BGP churn
Description: OSPF adjacency may drop when BGP table exceeds 500K prefixes during reconvergence. Affects ASR-9000 series running IOS-XR 7.9.x. Fixed in IOS-XR-7.10.1.

Title: BFD session timeout false positive on 100GE interfaces
Description: BFD may report false link-down on 100GE interfaces under high utilisation (>90%). Affects ASR-9000 series. Workaround: increase BFD interval to 300ms.

Title: MPLS LDP session reset during ECMP rebalancing
Description: LDP sessions may reset when ECMP path count changes from 2 to 1 during link failure. Affects MX10000 series. Fixed in JUNOS-24.1R1.
